abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Clinkz gains increased attack speed and attack range for a short duration. While active, Clinkz summons Skeleton Archers with each attack.
abilities.notes: Summons a Skeleton Archer with each attack during Strafe.

abilities.name: Tar Bomb
abilities.description: Clinkz throws a bomb of tar that explodes on contact, dealing damage and slowing enemies in the area. Skeleton Archers deal bonus damage against targets affected by Tar Bomb.
abilities.notes: Skeleton Archers prioritize targets affected by Tar Bomb.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly, gaining increased movement speed. When the invisibility breaks, Clinkz gains bonus attack speed for a short duration.
abilities.notes: Invisibility breaks when attacking, casting spells, or using items.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description: Clinkz consumes a target creep, gaining health and damage based on the consumed unit's max health.
abilities.notes: Instantly kills the target creep. Cannot target ancient creeps or heroes.

innate_abilities.name: Bone and Arrow
innate_abilities.description: Clinkz can summon Skeleton Archers that attack his enemies. Each archer deals a percentage of Clinkz's attack damage.
innate_abilities.notes: Skeleton Archers are summoned through various abilities and on Clinkz's death. They follow and attack Clinkz's targets.
